resources.string: After a long hard day at work, you arrive in a cab back home. There is a huge cardboard box on your doorstep.
You decide to check it out and take it inside. You plop it down on the table and run your hands across the OPEN end.
Inside you find the most beautifully crafted victorian doll, its dress is a beautiful shade of burgundy red. There is something crafted on her shoe.
On a closer look, it reads \"Alice\" in beautiful calligraphy.
Place Alice on your antiquity shelf
You leave Alice on the couch and decide to go have a long bath. You hear a loud thud and rush to the living room and see Alice missing.
You walk hastily through your house and until you see her there, sitting as though its her place, on your antiquity shelf, with your other collector\'s doll fallen on the ground.
You place her there and go ahead to freshen up a bit. As you are washing your face, you hear a silent hum. \"99 bottles of rum on bear on the wall\" followed by a loud thud.
You decide its too much for you to process today and continue freshening up. After all an evil doll is the least of your concerns.
You decide to leave it outside.
